create_dialog_description: Fill in the details below to create your new community.
be_the_first_to_create: Be the first to create one!
request_pending_description: Your request to join this community is awaiting approval from an admin.
private_community_description: You must be a member to see its posts, events, and other content.
community_analytics_description: Analytics and reports for this community will be displayed here.

analytics.no_data: No analytics data available for this community yet.
analytics.engagement_description: Average engagement across posts and events.
